attributes.action: To scrap the road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the whole idea of road pricing is just a further way, of raising revenue from the already hard pressed motorist. If road pricing comes in will this goverment do away with road tax and fuel duty to compensate, I think not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
